donateOrTipText2: If useful, consider making a donation or sending a tip:
originalFDroid: Original F-Droid logo by William Theaker and Robert Martinez
modifiedVersion: Modifed version of F-Droid logo and Monero, Dogecoin and Nextcoin icons by
featureImage0: Boilr is a free, as in freedom, Android app which monitors Bitcoin, cryptocurrencies, cryptoassets, futures and options, triggering price alarms according to your settings.
featureImage1:
Boilr supports 70+ exchanges and all their pairs.

Market data is retrieved directly from the exchanges via Wi-Fi or Mobile Data (if allowed), using libdynticker.
featureImage2:
Price Hit

Triggered when price crosses the alarm's upper or lower limit.
featureImage3:
Price Change

Triggered when price changes more than X amount (in currency or percentage) in a specified time frame (e.g. 15 min). It uses a rolling time frame: price is fetched with a given update interval (e.g. 30 s) and compared with the price fetched one time frame ago (e.g. 15 min ago).
featureImage4: Triggered alarms ring, displaying their status, until you turn them off. Just like an alarm clock.
featureImage5: Lists of exchanges, pairs and alarms are fully searchable, allowing quick alarm setup and configuration.
featureImage6: Sound and vibration are configurable globally and individually for each alarm.
featureImage8: Reorder alarms after a long click.
featureImage9: Supports multiple languages: Chinese, Czech, French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese and Spanish.
featureImage10: There is an alternative light theme.
